page.title: 17ACTIVITIES - METHODIST (2)
page.content: The {Womens Fellowship}meets at 2.30pm on the Wednesdays that Mothers Union does not take place. It usually takes the form of a service with refreshments and visiting speakers. About 15 members attend, and there is an annual rally at the end of September for other groups in the Andover area. The{Wesley Guild}meets on Wednesday evenings at 7.30pm between October and May, but not during January and February. Their programme includes cultural and devotional activities, with films, speakers and musical items. About 20 members usually attend.Visits to other Guilds also take place, and the season ends with a Guild rally.
